name: dragInteraction(_:sessionForAddingItems:withTouchAt:)
desc: Asks the delegate which drag session to add drag items to when there is more than one in-progress session.
declaration:
optional func dragInteraction(_ interaction: UIDragInteraction, 
        sessionForAddingItems sessions: [UIDragSession], 
                  withTouchAt point: CGPoint) -> UIDragSession?
